bill_title: Honoring Tyler Crissman of Sioux Falls as the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Tyler Crissman of Sioux Falls as the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year. WHEREAS, Tyler was chosen the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year, which is awarded by the South Dakota Soccer Association; and WHEREAS, Tyler Crissman, a sophomore at Augustana College in Sioux Falls, has been refereeing soccer for three years, in addition to being a manager for both the Washington High School boys' basketball and track teams; and WHEREAS, as a referee, Tyler has demonstrated desire, dependability, and knowledge of the game to all of those within the soccer community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Tyler Crissman be commended for his excellence within the South Dakota soccer community and congratulated for being chosen the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Tyler Crissman of Sioux Falls as the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year. WHEREAS, Tyler was chosen the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year, which is awarded by the South Dakota Soccer Association; and WHEREAS, Tyler Crissman, a sophomore at Augustana College in Sioux Falls, has been refereeing soccer for three years, in addition to being a manager for both the Washington High School boys' basketball and track teams; and WHEREAS, as a referee, Tyler has demonstrated desire, dependability, and knowledge of the game to all of those within the soccer community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Tyler Crissman be commended for his excellence within the South Dakota soccer community and congratulated for being chosen the 2006 South Dakota Young Male Referee of the Year.
